page.title: 05Children's playground games
page.content: Children from our class did a survey on children's playground games.We found out that the most poupular games were{"Tig around the tree,Hide and {seek,Kiss chase,Sticky toffee, cops {and robber's.These games are played all around the year.We found out that} all of these games have a set of rules.Most children said that they they had learned the rules by listening, watching and joining in with other children in the playground. Hardly any of the games need any kind of equipment.Before they can be played.Every one in the class was able to name 10 or more games (Range 10-26)
